metadata.synopsis: In the mocumentary-style directorial debut of Glenn Rockowitz, supremely untalented comics vie for a spot in an upcoming stand-up comedy festival.

reviews: [R]efreshingly aggressive and offensive... to say 'it lacks a sense of political correctness' would be a massive understatement...
It might be the perfect frat house flick.
...there's no denying that Hacks is one of the funniest movies to come along in a long while.
